name: Divide by Box
description:
Each number represents the area of the box.

Create a box that matches the selected number by dragging on the surface to see it getting created.

Double tap to deselect.

The objective is to divide the grid into rectangular and square pieces such that each piece contains exactly one number, and that number represents the area of the rectangle.

Here is a youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9LBMHZHqZEw

For more information about me and the game, you can check my webiste: http://nelsonalmendra.com

My Twitter: @NelsonAlmendra
